Define.Name: P_EXDEP_INFO_NAME
Define.Description: The generic name of the PTS external dependency file being referenced as stated in the generic external dependencies XML file.

Define.Name: P_EXDEP_PACKAGE_TITLE
Define.Description: The generic title of the PTS external dependency file being referenced, used within the generic external dependencies XML file.

Define.Name: P_EXDEP_PACKAGE_POSSIBLENAMES
Define.Description: If the operating system / distribution in use is not supported by the external dependencies function, the value of this string will be printed that shows some possible package names for the referenced generic package to aide the user in the manual installation of test dependencies.

Define.Name: P_EXDEP_PACKAGE_GENERIC
Define.Description: The generic name of the PTS external dependency file being referenced within an external dependency XML file.

Define.Name: P_EXDEP_PACKAGE_SPECIFIC
Define.Description: The OS/distribution-specific name of the PTS external dependency file being referenced.

Define.Name: P_EXDEP_PACKAGE_FILECHECK
Define.Description: The file(s) to check to see whether the referenced package is already present on the system or not. Multiple files/folders to check can be supplied by delimiting each one with a comma or if there is a possibility for multiple files, an or conditional can be used by delimiting each of the folders/files with an OR delimiter.

Define.Name: P_EXDEP_PACKAGE_ARCHSPECIFIC
Define.Description: If the package is specific or only available to a certain software / processor architecture, the name of the architecture must be supplied to this optional tag. Multiple architectures can be supplied by delimiting each one with a comma. The Phoronix Test Suite processor strings are used.
